description:
handmade model 77 Sharps action, .45-70 cal., style of 1877-79; barrel is black; wood is light colored; cross hatch engraved on wooden part of barrel near neck; metal parts have floral motif engravings; moving measuring devices on top of stock; engraved muzzle; extensive front sight. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
marks: \"Ed Webber Big Timber Montana USA\", engraved on to
title: American-Style Long Range, Single-Shot Target Rifle
